'''Stadium "Speedy Snack" Round Stool''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Stadium "Speedy Snack" Round Stool is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=80}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=30}}.
